brewery.brewery_description:
10 barrel brewery restaurant and beer garden located in Old Town Monterey, focusing on bright, aromatic hop-forward beers, and a variety of traditional and experimental ales & lagers.

Alvarado Street Brewery Production Facility & Tasting Room in Salinas.

venue.venue_name: Rincon Valley Tap Room and Bottle Shop

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

beer.beer_description:
This isn’t some weekend softball league, this is Major League Skazeball. ASB and HPB are in the heart of the batting order, stepping up to the plate ready to mash. Scouting reports detail an unbelievable 80 grade for all five tools in the hop charge: Nelson, Krush, Nectaron, HBC 1019 and Citra Hypberboost. Our sweet, fluid, gameplay is a non-stop highlight reel of citrus, stone fruit and tropical nectar. And our soft, effortless delivery is putting the League on notice. It's a whole new skaze-ball game.

*We printed 9 collectible label variants - eight featuring our favorite stadiums from that old N64 classic, plus one ultra-rare holographic chase can (only about 200 cans hidden in the wild among thousands!).
beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

items.badge_name: Super Style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy (Level 15)
items.badge_description: What’s better than a hazy IPA? A double/imperial hazy! For all you super hazy hopheads, the sixth of our “Super Style” badges, celebrates DNEIPAs, the 5th most checked-in style of 2021. AVAILABLE ONLY TO UNTAPPD INSIDERS

items.checkin_comment: I knew I had this one before. Weirdo putting this as a year release on untappd are fuckbois. Yall wear high heels behind closed doors for making me get another lager. #moarks. Anyway had this yearly n the moveza varitybin 2020

user.bio: Loggin since Nov 2017. Don't over think it...just drink it! ? Talk to your local H.R.

beer.beer_description: A dry hopped West Coast lager and Bronze medal winner at the 2019 Great American Beer Festival in Contemporary American Pilsner. Inspired by a San Diego garage homebrew recipe from 2011, bitterness is light and crisp, but hop aroma & flavor from 100% Citra hops are front and center.

items.checkin_comment: 85% sure I had this cuz the can art is straight dub worthy. I'll spit some w.c just looking at it. That being said, i hv work n its too late for this bs but im up puzzling cuz my piece count is lackin since mid aug. Was trying to hit 50k this year

user.bio: Loggin since Nov 2017. Don't over think it...just drink it! ? Talk to your local H.R.

beer.beer_description: This is a hoppy Mexican lager, inspired by a San Diego garage homebrew recipe from 2011. Bitterness is light and crisp, but hop aroma & flavor are front and center. We overuse the word "tropical", but there's really no better way to describe Citraveza, as the interaction between the lager yeast and these hops make for a truly unique beer.

user.bio: From PBR to PTY, I check into every beer I drink.

beer.beer_description: Black Label is the TRIPLE version of Mai Tai P.A., our flagship Tropical West Coast IPA featuring 100% Mosaic hops. Dry hopped three times across fermentation and beyond, we continuously layer in the most oil-dense advanced hop products we can get our hands on. At 10.5%, you know you’re into something big, but it’s quite balanced and drinkable, and the high alcohol functions to absorb as many hop oils as possible, generating tremendous amounts of Mosaic expression. On the nose expect mango liqueur and blueberry reduction poured over flamed orange peels and candied pineapples floating on a bottomless ocean of rich passion fruit juice. All of that character carries over onto the palate and intensifies, offering a vivid reminder that this is one the biggest and most flavorful IPA’s in our portfolio.

user.bio: From PBR to PTY, I check into every beer I drink.

beer.beer_description: One of our original "Hazy" double IPA's that is constantly tweaked to draw out as much juice-like character as possible, utilizing the interactions of hops & expressive yeast. Leading with Nelson & Citra, with healthy additions of Simcoe, Krush, El Dorado and Strata for a tropical onslaught on the nose & palate. Bitterness is restrained, allowing for unhindered enjoyment of the heavenly mouthfeel and vivid fruit character. World Beer Cup 2025 Silver medal winner for Juicy or Hazy Imperial India Pale Ale.
beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

beer.beer_description: Mai Tai P.A. is our flagship. Our ride or die. The liquid expression of an obsession with Mosaic hops. After medaling at the 2024 World Beer Cup (its sixth medal at a major beer competition) we decided to take things to the next level. This isn’t just a Double Dry Hopped version of Mai Tai, this is a small batch attempt at Mai Tai perfection. Yes, the layers of Mosaic driven flavor are exquisite (thanks to several well timed additions of high quality lupulin), but we didn’t stop there. We worked hard to elevate everything: the quality of the bitterness, the color, the clarity, the foam, the mouthfeel… The result? Well, to be honest, we wanted to keep it all for ourselves. But don’t worry, we are happy to spread this GOLD around.

The dedication of our disciples of chill has resulted in our new Chill’d Out series, a collection of Snocone-inspired Imperial Sour Ales. They feature grin-inspiring candy sweetness, loud fruit flavors, bright acidity and a light, effervescent, drinking experience.  First up is Tiger’s Blood, the classic combination of strawberry, watermelon and coconut.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 60)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 61!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 315 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 64!

beer.beer_description: The dedication of our disciples of chill has resulted in our new Chill’d Out series, a collection of Snocone-inspired Imperial Sour Ales. They feature grin-inspiring candy sweetness, loud fruit flavors, bright acidity and a light, effervescent, drinking experience.  First up is Tiger’s Blood, the classic combination of strawberry, watermelon and coconut.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

beer.beer_description: One of our original "Hazy" double IPA's that is constantly tweaked to draw out as much juice-like character as possible, utilizing the interactions of hops & expressive yeast. Leading with Nelson & Citra, with healthy additions of Simcoe, Krush, El Dorado and Strata for a tropical onslaught on the nose & palate. Bitterness is restrained, allowing for unhindered enjoyment of the heavenly mouthfeel and vivid fruit character. World Beer Cup 2025 Silver medal winner for Juicy or Hazy Imperial India Pale Ale.
beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 310 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 63!

beer.beer_description: Minesweeper was our first ever brewed IPA and remains a local favorite at our Monterey Brewpub. With Juicy Sweeper we've taken the same beer, employed an expressive yeast strain and sprinkled in some Nelson and Strata to amp up the bright tropical & stone fruit notes that play so well with our usual heavy handed dose of Simcoe & Citra. It lives up to the name. This is one juice-tastic Hazy IPA, even without the elevated ABV to cling onto all of those delicate hop oils. The dense charge of flavor that sweeps over your palate holds strong into a finish that never seems to end. Simply put- its straight juice.

items.badge_description: It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 490 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 99! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 280 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 57!

beer.beer_description: Good gracious, hops audacious. We took Citra and Audacia, dropped them in heavy, and let this hazy IPA ride wit us. Big waves of mango, citrus, and white grape pop like a bassline on repeat laid over a smooth, pillowy body. It’s juicy, it’s loud, it’s hot in herre, so grab one, take a sip, and tell your taste buds to shake ya tailfeather.

A staple hazy IPA brewed with the "holy trinity" of hops - Simcoe, Citra, Mosaic. Double Dry Hopped for maximum juice, heaps of oats & wheat for a soft, pillowy texture on the palate. Fermented with an expressive yeast strain that pumps out stone fruit flavors which complement the tropical hop oil contribution.

An American Pale Ale paying homage to a certain iconic, mountain-inspired brewery. Built on a foundation of 2-row and crystal malts, this throwback brew is dry-hopped with the classic “C” hops—Cascade, Centennial, and Chinook. Bright aromas of freshly cut pine and zesty lemon rind transport you straight to the heart of the Pacific Northwest. Each sip is a trip back in time to the glory days of craft beer: bitter and balanced with notes of grapefruit, orange, and a hint of floral pine. Old school in the best way possible.

One of our original "Hazy" double IPA's that is constantly tweaked to draw out as much juice-like character as possible, utilizing the interactions of hops & expressive yeast. Leading with Nelson & Citra, with healthy additions of Simcoe, Krush, El Dorado and Strata for a tropical onslaught on the nose & palate. Bitterness is restrained, allowing for unhindered enjoyment of the heavenly mouthfeel and vivid fruit character. World Beer Cup 2025 Silver medal winner for Juicy or Hazy Imperial India Pale Ale.
beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

beer.beer_description: Fear causes hesitation, and hesitation will get your palate wrecked. That’s why we loaded this crispy little banger with the holy trinity of Simcoe, Citra & Mosaic (both t90 & Cryo) for max impact at a sessionable 5%. Bursting with citrus, pine & tropical fruit, it’s all the West Coast flavor without wiping out your palate. Perfect for when you’re learning to surf, chasing the Ex-Presidents, or just living life a quarter mile at a time—wait, wrong movie. Either way… Utah, get yourself two.

items.badge_description: Keep the party rolling all day long with your favorite low ABV session IPAs. That's 45 different beers with style of IPA - Session. Try 5 more for Level 10!

beer.beer_description: Winner of FIVE Great American Beer Festival medals, three of them gold, including our 2023 award for American Strong Pale Ale! Plus a 2024 World Beer Cup bronze medal for American-Style Strong Pale Ale! Our drier, decidedly “tropical” IPA that’s light on bitterness, but heavy on hop aroma, courtesy of 100% Mosaic hops. One whiff and you get super intense notes of passion fruit, mango, and lychee. Grain bill of just American two-row malt and a clean fermentation keep it simple and allow these hops to shine.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: One of our original "Hazy" double IPA's that is constantly tweaked to draw out as much juice-like character as possible, utilizing the interactions of hops & expressive yeast. Leading with Nelson & Citra, with healthy additions of Simcoe, Krush, El Dorado and Strata for a tropical onslaught on the nose & palate. Bitterness is restrained, allowing for unhindered enjoyment of the heavenly mouthfeel and vivid fruit character. World Beer Cup 2025 Silver medal winner for Juicy or Hazy Imperial India Pale Ale.

Pure hop juice in a glass (or can)! Plain and simple. We combine a unique blend of hops and an expressive yeast strain to create flavors of peach rings, mango, guava and pulpy, fresh-squeezed orange. Low bitterness and a chewy, full-flavored mouthfeel conveys maximum juiciness, while maintaining balance and drinkability.

Passionfruit, Orange & Guava kettle sour ale. Same recipe, same POG-juice combo since 2015! Recent World Beer Cup Gold medal winner in 2025 and Silver medal winner in 2024 for American-Style Sour Ale, & Great American Beer Festival Silver medal winner in 2020 for Contemporary Gose.

A staple hazy IPA brewed with the "holy trinity" of hops - Simcoe, Citra, Mosaic. Double Dry Hopped for maximum juice, heaps of oats & wheat for a soft, pillowy texture on the palate. Fermented with an expressive yeast strain that pumps out stone fruit flavors which complement the tropical hop oil contribution.

The first ever beer brewed here at Alvarado Street Brewery and a local favorite at our Monterey brewpub. This Rustic West Coast IPA is brewed with 100% British Maris Otter pale malt and fermented with a German yeast strain to maximize the creamy rich body. Dry hopped exclusively with Simcoe and Citra both T90 and Cryo that deliver a blast of pine, grapefruit and fresh squeezed orange juice folded around a blend of sweet berries.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: If Doc Brown were to jump in his time machine on a quest to drink a Hazy Double IPA in 2024, this would certainly be the one! That flux capacitor requires a whole lot of juice to get him back home and this beer is more than up to the task. An expressive yeast strain strikes with a bolt of tropical-fruit laden ester character, amplified by a not-so small addition of oily, luscious, lupulin rich Cryo powder. Brace yourself for a blend of mango, pink guava, pineapple and lime nectars poured over a pile of cotton candy, creamsicles and juicy fruit. Soft, silky texture, light bitterness, high drinkability. Very high gigawatts.

New age double IPA that's heavily impacted by the bright peach & stonefruit notes imparted by an East Coast yeast strain. Simple dry hop consisting of purely Citra, resulting in a citrusy/tropical melange of hop aroma and flavor; passion fruit, tangerine, pineapple, white wine-esque grape character round out with a soft bitterness.

A West Coast-style Imperial IPA that’s been in our playbook since 2014. Monster dry hop of Citra, Mosaic, Strata and Mosaic Cryo with a clean fermentation keeps it devilishly dank & lush on the nose with assertive oily hop flavor and bitterness. Dry finish, hidden alcohol makes it dangerously drinkable. 
2023 World Beer Cup Silver Medalist, 2023 Gold Medalist at Bistro DIPA Fest, 2020 Silver Medalist and 2019 Gold Medalist in the Imperial IPA category at the Great American Beer Festival, and 2019 Winner of the Alpha King Challenge.

beer.beer_name: The Best Part of Waking Up
beer.beer_description:
Our classic milk stout on nitro with coffee, lactose and vanilla beans. The dark malts in the grist
bring all of the espresso/chocolate/roasted notes to the table and then we amp them up with
coffee and vanilla. Then add some lactose to increase the perception of sweetness. THEN we
put it on nitro so it goes down soooo smoooth. There are a lot of different elements balancing
against each other in this beer, but it doesn’t create a complicated sip- and the result is a very
drinkable, very tasty stout.
A pie-inspired fruited sour ale brewed with blueberries and Madagascar vanilla beans. A slice of heaven that pours into a glass!

All the tropical Mosaic & El Dorado you can handle! We kicked up the intensity level a notch on this batch in order to leverage alcohol’s ability to hold onto hop oils. The end result, in more ways than one, is our most potent batch of Runoffs to date. It delivers a burst of ripe honeydew melon, blueberry and strawberry floating atop a deep pool of citrus oil and passion fruit perfume.  A silky mouthfeel and softness on the palate make for a smooth race to the finish. Eins, zwei, drei!

No jet ski necessary to indulge in the tropical bliss squeezed out of the hop oils in this double IPA. Enhanced by a colorful yeast strain that hones in on the Simcoe and Mosaic hops and turns them into magic. Chewy, silky body courtesy of Mecca Grade Wickiyup hard red wheat from Oregon.

Everything that you love about our classic POG juice, but with the volume turned way up. It is crammed to the brim with tropical fruit flavor, but still manages to be impeccably- or should we say- dangerously, well balanced. An unapologetic island vacation in a can.

While making beer isn't quite akin to taking the first step on the moon, our industry’s very nature demands progress through exploration and accepting certain elements of risk. If we aren't trying new things, how will we know what’s possible? This beer is a nod towards taking that leap; fermented with an expressive yeast strain for maximum ester production and a grist purpose built for maximum lupulin solubility. Hopped with nine different varieties of hops, several in the form of advanced hop products, each specifically chosen and added at specific times across four different stages. The result is an imperial IPA with an enormously complex fruit character, balanced bitterness, and a palate so soft it nearly defies gravity.
The iconic beer of the Salinas Valley & Monterey Peninsula, resurrected from 1934. Crisp, refreshing & perfect for any occasion.

Dedicated to the Ag workers of the Salinas Valley, this is a juicy, hop forward beer that drinks more like an IPA than a traditional balanced American pale ale. The yeast strain produces nectarine-like, stone fruit esters which blend beautifully with dank hops like Eureka, Mosaic & Azacca. Enjoy this rather hazy interpretation of what we think is a damn delicious hoppy pale ale.

IPA with a fruity yeast strain and glorious Nelson Sauvin and Southern Cross hops from New Zealand. In this series we explore various hops from the Southern Hemisphere in the quest to bring you the ultimate hop sensory experience. Mouthfeel is creamy from the addition of chit malt & oats.

This Gose-style ale is soured with five strains of natural, probiotic bacteria for bright acidity and a hint of locally harvested sea salt from Big Sur for balance. The base beer is then conditioned on Tayberry puree, a hybrid of raspberry and blackberry.

Delorean, Lamborghini....and now Isuzu. Amigo that is, 1992 to be exact. The next in our unofficial "car" series is dedicated to brewer Kevin Brown's insanely radical ride. Elegant fermentation character, dank hops, heirloom floor malted British barley for body and balance.

Hazy IPA with 100% insanely aromatic Nelson Sauvin hops from Freestyle Farms and Eggers Hops in New Zealand. Few hops have this much tropical fruit expression and we can’t get enough. This year' s batch is letting loose with some additional citrus, stone fruit and candied melon notes layered on top of the classic “crushed gooseberry” character they share with sauvignon blanc wines from the Marlborough region. No, Nelson- you aren’t our favorite “Baby!” beer- because we love you all equally…okay…well, I mean… don’t tell the others. Promise?

Thanksgiving-inspired, NorthFEAST-style IPA brewed with a cornucopia of malt, hops and yeast. More specifically 9 different grains, 11 different hops, and fermented with 3 yeast strains. Everything you'd want in a progressive, yeast driven IPA; bright aromatics, creamy body, light bitterness...big on hop flavor. Be thankful for beer!

A West Coast IPA built around the aroma and flavor of hops that have undoubtedly progressed the style into what it is today. With a clean fermentation lent by California Ale yeast, the tropical blast of Mosaic, deep tangerine of Citra, and passionfruit dankness of Simcoe all come into harmony that you can smell from several feet away. Recent bronze medal winner for American-Style India Pale Ale at the 2024 World Beer Cup!

This tremendously potent version of our classic POG sour has fruit and alcohol strength at its highest levels, and is brewed once a year around our Anniversary festivities. Epic amounts of passion fruit, orange and guava were required to achieve peak tropical relaxation in liquid form. Thanks for being on this journey with us, and enjoy responsibly!

Hazy Cream Double IPA with raw & malted oats, and milk sugar. Double Dry Hopped with Mosaic & Citra cryo hops along with Simcoe & Idaho 7 for a rush of bright tropical fruit flavors to the face. Creamy texture, hint of sweetness.

location.venue_address: Suite 112 - Carmel Plaza Ocean and Main Street
